TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Message extends System.ValueType

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构包装 Windows 发送的消息。The structure wraps messages that Windows sends. 您可以使用此结构来包装消息，并将其分配给要调度的窗口过程。You can use this structure to wrap a message and assign it to the window procedure to be dispatched. 你还可以使用此结构来获取有关系统发送到你的应用程序或控件的消息的信息。You can also use this structure to get information about a message the system sends to your application or controls. 有关 Windows 消息的详细信息，请参阅 [消息和消息队列](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198815)。For more information about Windows messages, see [Messages and Message Queues](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198815). 不能直接创建 。You cannot create the directly. 请改用 方法。Instead, use the method. 为了提高效率， 使用其现有的池 ，而不是实例化新的池（如果可能）。For the sake of efficiency, the uses its pool of existing s instead of instantiating a new one, if possible. 但是，如果 池中没有可用的，则会实例化一个新的。However, if a is not available in the pool, a new one is instantiated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法以处理中标识的操作系统消息 。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the . 在此示例中处理 WM_ACTIVATEAPP 操作系统消息，以了解其他应用程序何时变为活动状态。The WM_ACTIVATEAPP operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. 有关可用的 、 和值的信息 ，请参阅 [消息结构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198816) 文档。For information about the available , , and values, see the [MSG Structure](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198816) documentation. 有关实际常数值的信息，请参阅 [消息常量](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198817)。For information about the actual constant values, see [Message Constants](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198817). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置消息的窗口句柄。

span.span: Gets or sets the window handle of the message.
The window handle of the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks *窗口句柄* 是唯一标识系统上的窗口的值。*Window handle* is a value that uniquely identifies a window on the system. 此属性返回窗口过程接收此消息的窗口的句柄。This property returns a handle of the window whose window procedure receives this message. 当你的代码需要与一些需要窗口句柄作为参数的本机 Windows API 函数交互时，此方法非常有用。It is useful when your code need to interact with some native Windows API functions that expect window handles as parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段的值取决于消息。The value of this field depends on the message. 使用 字段可获取对处理消息很重要的信息。Use the field to get information that is important for handling the message. 通常用于存储对象（如果消息需要）。 is typically used to store an object if it is needed by the message. 使用 方法可以检索字段中的信息，并将其转换为 对象。Use the method to retrieve and convert information from the field into an object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法以处理中标识的操作系统消息 。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the . 在此示例中处理 WM_ACTIVATEAPP 操作系统消息，以了解其他应用程序何时变为活动状态。The WM_ACTIVATEAPP operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. 有关可用的 、 和值的信息 ，请参阅 [消息结构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198816) 文档。For information about the available , , and values, see the [MSG Structure](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198816) documentation. 有关实际常数值的信息，请参阅 [消息常量](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198817)。For information about the actual constant values, see [Message Constants](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198817). span.span: Gets or sets the field of the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段的值取决于消息。The value of this field depends on the message. 使用 字段可获取处理消息时重要的信息。Use the field to get information that is important to handling the message. 此字段通常用于存储少量信息，如标志。This field is typically used to store small pieces of information, such as flags. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法以处理中标识的操作系统消息 。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the . 在此示例中处理 WM_ACTIVATEAPP 操作系统消息，以了解其他应用程序何时变为活动状态。The WM_ACTIVATEAPP operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. 有关可用的 、 和值的信息 ，请参阅 [消息结构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198816) 文档。For information about the available , , and values, see the [MSG Structure](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198816) documentation. 有关实际常数值的信息，请参阅 [消息常量](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198817)。For information about the actual constant values, see [Message Constants](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=198817).
